meanings.definition: Aposporous: reproducing without the formation of spores or gametes.
meanings.sent1: The aposporous plant reproduced by a different method than most others.
meanings.sent2: The scientist studied the aposporous reproduction process in detail.
meanings.sent3: The aposporous plant decided to skip the spore party and do its own thing.
meanings.sent4: Her creativity was aposporous, sprouting new ideas without traditional inspiration.
meanings.sent5: The aposporous nature of the phenomenon puzzled researchers for years.
